businesses.description: Mine and Industrial Products & Services since 1961

More than 60 years ago the company MINET has developed the worldwide first belt fastener with the principle of a hinge as everybody use it today. It has developed itself to an international company group, which offers under the brand name Minet Lacing Technology a full range of products in the field of vulcanizing and belt jointing technology:</br>• Conveyor belt fasteners</br>• Spliceless endless belts</br>• Tools and accessories for Vulcanizers</br>• Vulcanizing presses</br>All of them are manufactured in modern factories in Europe. Together with five subsidiaries and sister companies the products are sold worldwide in more than 90 countries.</br>The company’s products range is leading the technical development and innovation in the field and is helping customers to increase the productivity and efficiency of modern belt conveyors.
